mapinfo.detailsText:
Players start along the coasts of this sunny region.
 Thanks to the sea there are always several sources of food and gold while the access to wood in the later stages may be more problematic.
 Shaolin and Zen have built their temples in the middle of the region, while commercial traffic takes place in the north.
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Shaolin / Zen 
 -Mercenaries: Wokou Horseman / Wokou Ronin 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
